item.title: Data Analytics Dashboard using Flask and Highcharts
item.description: A tutorial to develop a web dashboard for data analytics using Python Flask and JavaScript Highcharts.

item.title: Technical Resources for Automation and Control Professionals

Lipták Instrument Engineers’ Handbook: Process Control and Optimization, Béla G. Lipták Instrument Engineers’ Handbook: Process Software and Digital Networks, Béla G.
